body.p: When you need to reboot all nodes in your cloud and keep the cloud up and running, you should follow the instructions for rebooting controller, compute, and storage nodes, which are found below. Note that you should follow the order prescribed for each type of deployment, for example, Swift, VSA, or Ceph.

sectiondiv.p: Once you have rebooting all the other nodes, you must follow these additional steps for ESX deployments:

ol.li: The new cluster import can be performed directly with the command below on the already activated Data center (DC): eon cluster-import --vcenter-id <vcenter-id> --cluster-name <cluster-name> --cluster-moid <MOID of cluster>

If the cluster activation is on a new DC, follow the steps below before performing the cluster-import: Provide the correct eth interface details for data_interface_order and trunk_interface_order parameters as per the defined input model. Refer to Register ESX Cloud Network Configuration for more details.
